Description: Book of the Dead of Amenhotep; sheet 8; full colour vignettes; red and black ink; borders of stars above and below; row of Hieroglyphic text verso.
Curator's comments: Published: Lucarelli, Rita. 2015. The inhabitants of the Fourteenth Hill of Spell 149 of the Book of the Dead. In Morenz, Ludwig D. and Amr El Hawary (eds). Weitergabe: Festschrift für die Ägyptologin Ursula Rößler-Köhler zum 65. Geburtstag, 275-291. Weisbaden: Harrassowitz.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (7)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381156) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381156)
Taylor et al 2011 / The history and conservation of the papyrus of Tuy (p.96, p.98)
